system.requirements:
.Mechanicus Related Any Essential Repair Skill +10
Apt: Intelligence, Tech
system.descriptionText: Character can use Order to direct a comrade to put out a fire or assist in the effort. If comrade is assisting the Character in putting out a fire, they grant +20 to the test. If the comrade is doing it on their own, Player Character makes -20 Command Test to put it out. Can be used with Servitor Comrades in addition to normal ones. Note: Mechanicus Related = Any Tech-Priest or Regiment Sworn to the Mechanicus
